toggle.title: Toggle Argon Combat HUD
toggle.warning: Argon Combat HUD: No token selected. Please select a token to enable the HUD

color.label: Color
color.hint: Color of the actions tab and other main features of the HUD

color-bonus-action.hint: Color of the bonus action tab

color-free-action.hint: Color of the free action tab

color-end-turn.hint: Color of the end turn tab

color-tooltip.hint: Color of the tooltips and save/skills/tools popup

globalTheme.name: Theme Mode
globalTheme.hint: If set to 'Client' every player will be able to choose it's own theme. If set to 'World' the theme selected by the GM will be the same for every player.

scale.name: Scale
scale.hint: HUD Scale - if autoscale is enabled this setting will be used as a multiplier on top of the calculated scale

dialogTheme.name: Dialog Theme
dialogTheme.hint: Apply the Argon Theme to Dialogs opened from the HUD

autoScale.name: Auto Scale
autoScale.hint: Automatically scale the HUD based on the screen size. Ignores the scale setting

alwaysOn.name: Always On
alwaysOn.hint: Automatically show the hud whenever you select a token

leftPos.name: Left Position
leftPos.hint: Distance from the left border in pixels

botPos.name: Bottom Position
botPos.hint: Distance from the bottom border in pixels

playerDetailsBottom.name: Player Details on Bottom
playerDetailsBottom.hint: Positions players name and class information at bottom for portrait

showTooltipsSpecial.name: Show Tooltips for Special Actions
showTooltipsSpecial.hint: Show tooltips on hover for special actions (dodge,disengage,shove...)

showTooltipsAbilityMenuAbilities.name: Show Tooltips for Abilities
showTooltipsAbilityMenuAbilities.hint: Show tooltips on hover for abilities in the ability menu

showTooltipsAbilityMenuSkills.name: Show Tooltips for Skills
showTooltipsAbilityMenuSkills.hint: Show tooltips on hover for skills in the ability menu

showTooltipsAbilityMenuTools.name: Show Tooltips for Tools
showTooltipsAbilityMenuTools.hint: Show tooltips on hover for tools in the ability menu

fadeOutInactive.name: Fade Out
fadeOutInactive.hint: Fade out the HUD after not mouse overing it for 5 seconds

fadeoutDelay.name: Fadeout Delay
fadeoutDelay.hint: Delay before fading out the HUD in seconds

fadeoutOpacity.name: Fadeout Opacity
fadeoutOpacity.hint: Opacity of the HUD when faded out

hideMacroPlayers.name: Hide Macro Bar and Player list
hideMacroPlayers.hint: Hide Macro Bar and Player list while the HUD is opened

openCombatStart.name: Open on Combat Start
openCombatStart.hint: Open the HUD when a combat is started

switchEquip.name: Auto Equip
switchEquip.hint: Automatically equip/unequip items when switching sets

showWeaponsItems.name: Show Weapons in 'Use Item' Section
showWeaponsItems.hint: Show weapons in the 'Use Item' section. Usefull if your weapon slots are not enough

noAA.name: Don't Apply Active Effects
noAA.hint: Don't apply active effects when using special actions. (requires refresh)

noBlur.name: Disable Blur Effects
noBlur.hint: Disable blur effects on the HUD. This is a performance setting and should only be used if you experience performance issues.

suppressWarnings.name: Suppress Warnings
suppressWarnings.hint: If an error occurs, don't show a warning message and silently fail instead.

rangefinder.name: 3D Canvas - Range Finder
rangefinder.hint: Enable 3D Canvas Range Finder when hovering items in the HUD. When enabled will show the distance to the target - the distance will be Red if the target is out of range.

rangepicker.name: Target Picker
rangepicker.hint: When using an item or action that requires a target, this will show a target count that follows the mouse cursor until the correct amount of target is selected, use the +/- keys to manually adjust the required targets if needed.

rangepickerclear.name: Target Picker - Clear Targets
rangepickerclear.hint: When using an item or action that requires a target, clear all targets before entering Target Picker mode.

thememenu.name: Theme Customization
thememenu.hint: Configure, choose and cusomize Argon themes
thememenu.label: Configure Themes

themeOptions.autoTextColorTitle: Autoset Text Colors Based off Background
themeOptions.autoTextColorHint: This setting adjust the text color based on the background color to a color that should be legiable.
